features: Purchase Order Creation: Generate purchase orders directly within the system
Supplier Management: Manage your vendors, track all your purchases and payments against any vendor
Inventory Tracking: Keep real-time track of your inventory levels, including stock quantities, locations, and availability
Reorder Point and Auto-Replenishment: Set up reorder points for products to automatically trigger purchase orders when inventory reaches a predefined threshold
Reporting and Analytics: Generate comprehensive reports and analyze inventory data to gain insights into cost of goods, inventory stock reports, etc.
